#labels Iridium
Wiki for Iridium Code

= Introduction =

This will keep track of the changes made to the Iridium code and additions that need to be made. Also, an explation of the AT commands used is given. Below all that, relevant insights into wokring with Iridium are logged.


= Details =

==Version 4==
Reset MO and MT buffers
Interrupts for SBDIRING (currently the test code is buggy)
Low power mode
Tweak retries


==Version 3==
Cleaned up Code
Added Commenting
Receiving capability
If extra messages in gateway, daemon automatically receives
SBDIRING buggy
Added Verbose
Added Logging
Fixed a buffer initialization bug

==Version 2==
Fixed read issues

==Version 1==

Basic sending of data, no receiving
Issues with read buffer
